      • saveCanteen

        public void saveCanteen(CanteenDTO arg0,
                        java.util.List<java.time.LocalTime> arg1,
                        java.util.List<java.time.LocalTime> arg2)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                        AddFailedException
        Description copied from interface: UserSessionFacade
        Save the provided canteen in the database and then generate associated meals.

        For each WorkDay present in the database k meals (and respective menus) are created, where k is the size of the entry time list (exit time list has the same size). Each meal starts and ends at times specified in both lists.

        Specified by:
        saveCanteen in interface UserSessionFacade
        Parameters:
        arg0 - the DTO containing the new canteen's data.
        arg1 - the list of beginning times of each daily meal.
        arg2 - the list of ending times of each daily meal.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        AddFailedException - if saving goes wrong.

      • saveTripCheckpoint

        public void saveTripCheckpoint(java.lang.String fiscalCode,
                               EventDTO eventDTO,
                               java.time.LocalTime time,
                               java.lang.String busPlate,
                               TripDTO trip)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                               CheckpointFailedException
        Description copied from interface: UserSessionFacade
        Save in the database a checkpoint for the given person, on a trip event and at the time provided as attribute.

        Unlike normal checkpoint saving, this one performs a control making sure that exists a trip partecipation for the given person, on the given bus and for the provided trip before saving the checkpoint.

        Specified by:
        saveTripCheckpoint in interface UserSessionFacade
        Parameters:
        fiscalCode - fiscal code of the person that recorded on the event.
        eventDTO - the event on which the person recorded his presence.
        time - the time of recording.
        busPlate - the license plate of the bus on which the person is travelling.
        trip - the trip on which the event is occurring.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        CheckpointFailedException - if the saving goes wrong or no trip partecipation corresponding is found.
